name: Duck Duck.. Go!
description:
This is a game where you play as a brand new "Duck" search engine and race against other engines to win a tournament! "Search" (type) the prompts on your screen to get speed boosts to win!

Game made in collaboration with Minerd, who made the sprites for this game.

In-game music is CC0.

The characters in this game are fictional and their features don't represent any real life brand.
